mapper.select: select avg(rate) avg from video where time >= #{beginTime} and time < #{endTime} ;

select course_name, avg(rate) avg from video, course, classes, grade where video.course_id = course.course_id and video.classes_id = classes.classes_id and classes.grade_id = grade.grade_id and grade.grade_id = #{gradeId} GROUP BY course.course_name
